description:
Yuuya`s Duels will bring peace to the world... Reiji and the others truly believe that, but, right before their eyes, Z-ARC awakens...!! Z-ARC says that their belief in Yuuya is what resurrected him. To stop Z-ARC from using his tremendous power to bring despair to the world, Sora and Ed stand against him, and the Lancers begin a new battle!!
Source: crunchyroll
